name: Daisycon Transactions (dashboard widget)
author: Zonneveld Cloud

sections.description:
With this plugin, you can see your most recent Daisycon transactions in the WordPress admin dashboard. You can see all the transactions of the last month.

Disclaimer: This tool is developed by Zonneveld Cloud and not by Daisycon.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin is easy.

  1. Install the plugin on your WordPress site
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Login on Daisycon and add a account privilege to “Read only” (https://publishers.daisycon.com/en/account/users/overview/updateLang/true)
  4. Add your Daisycon account data in the settings page on your WordPress website (yoursite.com/wp-admin/admin.php?page=daisyconapi/index.php)
sections.changelog:
1.2

Bug fix while showing stats from last month transactions date instead of click date.

1.1

Added message when you did not fill in your account information
Added message when you did not set read-only access to your account

1.0.2

Added instructions on setting page about how to set your account to read-only

1.0.1

Fixed ‘Headers already sent’ bug when you activate the plugin

1.0

First release

short_description: See your Daisycon transactions as a widget in the admin dashboard, without logging in to your Daisycon account!
